statements: DELETE FROM successful_authentications WHERE authentication_method = 'password' AND authentication_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM authentication_logs WHERE user_id = 5 AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM authentication_logs WHERE user_id = 123 AND action = 'login'
DELETE FROM authenticated_users WHERE user_id = 100 AND authentication_time <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM authentication_failures WHERE failure_time > '2022-02-01' AND user_id = 200;
DELETE FROM authentication_logs WHERE success = false AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
